alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 1:44AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Humboldt County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow is expected Wednesday morning which could significantly impact morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
